title: President Donald J. Trump and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe are Working Together to Strengthen the U.S.-Japan Alliance â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 17, 2018
We cherish the friendship between the United States and Japan. And I cherish my friendship with Prime Minister Abe.
						President Donald J. Trump					A CLOSE FRIENDSHIP: President Donald J. Trump and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe have worked together to reaffirm and reinforce the unwavering alliance between the United States and Japan.SHARED PROSPERITY: President Trump and Prime Minister Abe are working to continue a decades-long tradition of shared economic successes between our two nations.DENUCLEARIZING THE KOREAN PENINSULA: President Trump has worked with Japan to achieve denuclearization of the Peninsula and to protect our allies from the North Korean threat.
